website_summaries.verdict: Regulation sized for adult leagues, but just as good for team-building, work retreats, and other grown-up games.
cons: Do not leave out in the sun

customer_reviews.title: The Perfect Dodgeball
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to buy these simply because they are rubber. However, after testing these at home I must say they are brilliant. I liked them so much I bought a dozen. I keep a ball rack next to my couch filled with these and unload when need be. So far no broken bones on the small humans/animals and minimal house damage. Great set for the money.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Hutchins

customer_reviews.title: Works like it should
customer_reviews.text: My team plays dodgeball with these maybe three times a week. High school kids really ripping them at each other and not one of them has popped.
customer_reviews.author: Preston Picus

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: These were a great value and durability! Would purchase again if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! I purchased this for our local boys and girls club!:)
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Marie Hall

customer_reviews.title: Decent balls
customer_reviews.text: The balls have great grip as bludgers. Price was pretty good. The balls that came appeared to each have their own levels of defects. Most of which were small and shouldn't impact their use, but may lead to reduced longevity through heavy use.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived just as described. Worked out perfectly for unit morale days. You will not be disappointed in the craftsmanship or longevity of use from this product.
customer_reviews.author: ClutchCPT

customer_reviews.title: Good Balls
customer_reviews.text: On time delivery and durable. Just had our dodgeball tournament and they held up very nicely.
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: DONT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Received these expensive balls and 2 were defective. Returned them and bought cheaper ones that were better quality
customer_reviews.author: Tanna

customer_reviews.title: Excellent dodgeball balls
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sized for dodgeball. If you have large enough hands you can palm them. They have enough weight that you can you can throw them pretty hard. I didn't know how big they would be when I ordered them. They are about the size of a volleyball.
customer_reviews.author: Hugo Sherrard

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Hurt when you get it, but then again you are playing dodgeball.. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: anz1979

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Really please with the product and the delivery time. I purchased dodge balls online from another vendor and I wasn't impressed with the product. I saw good ratings on this and decided to give it a shot. I can't wait to use these balls at the middle school lock-in. Perfect for my youth group activities!
customer_reviews.author: Tyrone Hightire

customer_reviews.title: Perfect dodge balls for older kids!
customer_reviews.text: These dodge balls are perfect for our church youth group! I love the fact they come as a set of six!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 4 sons

product_meta.title: Mikasa Official 8.5" Rubber Dodgeball Set of Six
product_meta.description: Mikasa Official Dodgeball Set. Mikasa's official sized 8.5 Dodgeballs are ideal for indoor and outdoor play. Special stippled composition rubber cover enhances grip while providing excellent durability. Latex-free construction. Silver-gray color. Priced for one set of six Mikasa Dodgeballs.
